complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set up project foundation and development environment
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down project setup into: package.json initialization with dependencies, TypeScript configuration, development tooling setup (ESLint/Prettier/Jest), project structure creation, and git repository initialization with proper .gitignore
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Standard project setup with well-defined tools and patterns. Straightforward configuration tasks with clear documentation available.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Design and implement Notion database schemas
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: Workflows database design and creation, Stage Pages database with relations, Subagent Tasks database implementation, and database templates and validation setup
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity due to relational database design in Notion, API integration requirements, and need for proper schema validation and templates.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Notion API integration layer
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: NotionService class foundation, CRUD operations implementation, error handling and rate limiting, TypeScript interfaces and types, webhook signature verification, and logging and configuration setup
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to API integration challenges, rate limiting handling, webhook security, and need for robust error handling patterns.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build orchestration server with webhook handling
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into: Express server setup and middleware, webhook endpoint implementation, webhook signature validation, agent spawning logic, security and rate limiting, environment configuration, and process lifecycle management
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving server architecture, security concerns, process management, and coordination between multiple system components.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Bootstrapper agent core functionality
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: BootstrapperAgent class foundation, codebase scanning and file analysis, AST parsing implementation, dependency analysis with cruiser, Claude API integration, workflow specification generation, repository pattern detection, and Notion output formatting
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity involving AI integration, codebase analysis, AST parsing, and intelligent pattern recognition across multiple programming languages.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create simple Implementer agent for MVP
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: ImplementerAgent class setup, file modification logic with backup, git operations integration, Claude API for code generation, change validation and testing, and Notion result reporting
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to code generation, git operations, change validation, and need for robust rollback mechanisms.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement end-to-end workflow orchestration for MVP
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into: state machine implementation, Bootstrapper to Implementer flow, error handling and recovery, workflow status tracking, timeout management with cron, logging and monitoring, and cleanup mechanisms
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving state management, error recovery, timing coordination, and integration of multiple agent types.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Planner agent for three-stage workflow
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: PlannerAgent class foundation, specification generation for APIs/schemas, architectural analysis with madge, Claude API planning integration, specification validation, detailed task breakdown generation, and Notion output formatting
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring architectural analysis, AI-driven planning, specification generation, and coordination between exploration and implementation phases.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Update orchestration for three-stage pipeline
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: state machine extension for planning stage, conditional stage execution logic, state persistence in Notion, webhook handling updates, and workflow specification validation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity building on existing orchestration with additional state management and conditional logic.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement subagent task management system
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into: SubagentTaskManager class, parallel execution with Promise handling, task result synthesis, subagent configuration validation, dependency resolution with topological sorting, and error handling for partial failures
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving parallel processing, dependency resolution, result synthesis, and coordination of multiple concurrent agents.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Git worktree management system
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: GitWorktreeManager class implementation, worktree creation and naming conventions, cleanup and lifecycle management, multi-repository support, and error handling for git operations
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving git operations, file system management, and proper cleanup handling across multiple repositories.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Enhance Implementer agents for parallel execution in worktrees
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: ImplementerAgent refactoring for worktrees, worktree context isolation, parallel execution support, cross-worktree coordination, change tracking and diff generation, PR/MR creation with octokit, and change validation in worktrees
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving parallel processing, git worktree management, cross-worktree coordination, and integration with GitHub/GitLab APIs.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement multi-repository support and coordination
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into: multi-repo management extension, CrossRepoCoordinator implementation, repository discovery and configuration, cross-repo context sharing, plugin architecture for different repo types, cross-repo validation, rollback coordination, and repository provider integrations
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Very high complexity involving coordination across multiple repositories, plugin architecture, and complex rollback scenarios.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Claude Skills system for dynamic expertise loading
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: SkillsManager implementation, skill discovery and mapping system, public and custom skill support, skill combination and conflict resolution, skill validation and format checking, and dynamic loading in agent spawning
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving file system operations, skill conflict resolution, dynamic loading mechanisms, and integration with agent spawning.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop MCP server integrations for specialized capabilities
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: Codebase Search MCP server development, Pattern Analysis MCP implementation, Cross-Repo Search MCP creation, MCP server discovery and configuration, error handling and timeout management, health checking and fallback mechanisms, and documentation and examples
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving custom MCP server development, AST analysis, semantic search implementation, and distributed system coordination.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Add comprehensive error handling and recovery mechanisms
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into: custom error classes and types, structured logging with winston, distributed tracing with opentelemetry, retry logic with exponential backoff, health checks for all components, and workflow recovery mechanisms
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring comprehensive error taxonomy, distributed tracing, recovery mechanisms, and integration across all system components.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create configuration management and deployment system
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: configuration management with dotenv and joi validation, environment-specific configurations, Docker containerization and deployment scripts, secrets management and security, and backup and restoration procedures
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving standard DevOps practices, containerization, and security considerations for secrets management.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement monitoring, metrics, and observability dashboard
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into: monitoring dashboard with Express, metrics collection implementation, Prometheus and Grafana integration, workflow visualization, performance profiling and bottleneck identification, and cost tracking with budget alerting
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving real-time monitoring, metrics aggregation, visualization, and performance analysis across distributed components.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Separate into: documentation structure and VitePress setup, API documentation with OpenAPI generation, user guides and tutorials with examples, and troubleshooting guides and FAQ compilation
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving documentation tooling, example creation, and comprehensive coverage of all system features.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Conduct integration testing and production readiness validation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide into: integration test suite with Jest and Supertest, end-to-end workflow testing, performance testing with autocannon, chaos engineering and failure testing, security testing for webhooks and input validation, compatibility testing across repository types, and user acceptance testing
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity requiring comprehensive testing strategies, performance validation, security testing, and coordination of testing across all system components.
